Hey [Boss's Name],

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to take a moment to sincerely apologize for how I handled the recent situation with [Client's Name]. I realize that my approach didn’t align with our standards, and it may have caused some frustration.

I completely understand how important client relationships are to our team, and I take full responsibility for my oversight. Moving forward, I’m committed to learning from this experience and ensuring that it doesn’t happen again. If there’s an opportunity to make amends with [Client's Name], I’d appreciate your guidance on how best to do that.

Thanks for your understanding, and I appreciate your support as I work through this.

Best,  
[Your Name]
